SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.internal

Class OpaqueTokenStore

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.internal.OpaqueTokenStore
@Service @Transactional public class OpaqueTokenStore extends Object
Opaque token storage implementation using database persistence. Implements constitutional requirement for opaque tokens (no JWT).
